root: ^You seem like a wise human. So you probably hate veggies, too, don't you?
^As the superior food, I demand you to destroy all the veggies you see. They don't belong into this lunch box.
^But I'll be fair. I'll let you to decide your main quest.

broccoli: ^Oh, so you want to destroy some broccoli families! Excellent choice, off you go then!
cabbage: ^Yeah, those annoying balls deserve to have their ego destroyed. Go blast them!
carrot: ^I really hate those pointy morons. Please, make them extinct!
